name: Mewtwo
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.

abilities.name: Mind Report
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may put a Supporter card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
